text: Kanyakumari District Railway Users’ Association (KDRUA) has urged the railway authorities to print details on train tickets in Tamil also, along with Hindi and English. Its secretary P. Edward Jeni said that a majority of people in the State could read only Tamil. They were forced to depend on others to make sure that the printed details were right. Many a times these people were penalised for boarding the wrong trains, Mr. Jeni said.
title: Plea to print train tickets in Tamil
